item.title: New PC!
item.description: So I am the happy owner a shiny new self-built PC and so far I’m very pleased with it. This is the first time I have built my own computer and, really, this is the first desktop PC I have owned (although I pretty much exclusively used my parent’s desktop when I lived at home). Until now I have been a laptop-man. I’m on my second laptop currently and it’s probably close to being replaced with a new one soon.
